title: Second to None
description: Second to NoneRhyannon ByrdFor eight long years, Jason Hawkes has bided his time, waiting for the chance to snare Remy Frost for his own. When fate finally delivers a panting, wide-eyed Remy right into his arms, he intends to never let her go. His objective-to convince the wary redhead that he wants her forever. And lucky for Remy, this ex-soldier is ready to play "down and dirty" to get what he wants.Publisher's Note: Previously published in the Down and Dirty anthology.
author: Rhyannon Byrd
